plays.text: Penalty to Brian Leetch 2 minutes for Tripping Aleksey Morozov
Penalty to Vladimir Malakhov 2 minutes for Tripping Kris Beech
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Roughing Theo Fleury
Goal scored by Milan Kraft assisted by Aleksey Morozov and Kris Beech
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Holding Mike York
